deleteApiKey.title: Delete Access Key?
deleteApiKey.message: This action cannot be undone. The deleted access key will no longer be usable.

revokeApiKey.title: Revoke Access Key?
revokeApiKey.message: This action cannot be undone. The revoked access key will no longer be usable.

blockIp.title: Block IP Address?
blockIp.message: This will deny access from this IP address. You can unblock it later.

unblockIp.title: Unblock IP Address?
unblockIp.message: This will allow access from this IP address.

stopServer.title: Stop Server?
stopServer.message: Stopping the server will prevent access to AI services.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.description: Let's start setting up FLM. This wizard will guide you through the basic setup.

serverSetup.title: Server Setup
serverSetup.description: Configure the server. When you start the server, you can access AI services.

securitySetup.title: Security Setup
securitySetup.description: Configure security settings. You can create access keys, configure allow lists, and set access limits.

complete.title: Setup Complete
complete.description: Setup is complete. You can go to the dashboard and start using AI services.

help.title: How to Use Dashboard
help.description: The dashboard shows the status of AI engines, server, and security alerts.
help.engineStatus: Shows the status of AI engines. Displays states such as running healthy, degraded, or error.
help.proxyStatus: Shows the server status. Displays states such as running, stopped, or error.
help.securityAlerts: Shows important security information. You can check settings such as access key count, allow list, and access limits.

help.title: How to Use Chat Tester
help.description: Chat Tester allows you to send messages to AI models and check responses.
help.proxyEndpoint: Shows the server endpoint URL. If the server is not running, please start the server from the dashboard.
help.apiKey: Enter an access key to access services that require authentication. This is optional.
help.model: Select the AI model to use.
help.response: Shows the response from the AI model.

dashboard.title: Security Dashboard
dashboard.noFilteredLogs: No audit logs match the filter criteria

help.title: How to Use Security
help.description: Security settings allow you to manage access records, unauthorized access detection, anomaly detection, IP block list, allow list, and access limits.
help.auditLogs: Shows all access records. You can check who accessed when.
help.intrusionDetection: Detects and displays unauthorized access attempts.
help.anomalyDetection: Detects and displays anomalous behavior patterns.
help.ipBlocklist: Manages a list of IP addresses to block access.
help.whitelist: Manages a list of IP addresses to allow access.
help.rateLimit: Limits the number of accesses per minute.

whatIsEndpoint.question: What is an Endpoint URL?
whatIsEndpoint.answer: An endpoint URL is the address to access AI services. It is usually in the format "http://localhost:port number".

whatIsApiKey.question: What is an Access Key?
whatIsApiKey.answer: An access key is authentication information to access AI services. For security, do not share your access key with others.

whatIsProxy.question: What is a Server?
whatIsProxy.answer: A server is a program that relays access to AI services. When you start the server, you can access AI services.

errors.engineNotFoundSolution: Please check if the AI engine is installed.
errors.proxyStartFailedSolution: The server port may already be in use. Try a different port or close the application using the port.
errors.proxyNotRunning: Server is not running. Please start the server from the dashboard.
errors.proxyNotRunningSolution: Click the "Start Server" button on the dashboard.
errors.endpointNotFoundSolution: Please check if the server is running.
errors.chatRequestFailedSolution: Please check if the server is running and an AI model is selected.
errors.apiKeyCreationFailedSolution: Please try again later. If the problem persists, check the server status.
errors.whitelistUpdateFailedSolution: Please check if the IP address format is correct.
errors.blocklistUpdateFailedSolution: Please check if the IP address format is correct.
errors.rateLimitUpdateFailedSolution: Please check if the value is within the correct range.
errors.auditLogFetchFailedSolution: Please check if the server is running.
errors.intrusionDetectionFetchFailed: Failed to fetch unauthorized access detection
errors.intrusionDetectionFetchFailedSolution: Please check if the server is running.
errors.anomalyDetectionFetchFailedSolution: Please check if the server is running.
errors.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.genericErrorSolution: If the problem persists, please restart the application.
errors.networkError: A network error occurred. Please check your internet connection.
errors.networkErrorSolution: Please check your internet connection and firewall settings.
errors.timeoutError: A timeout error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.timeoutErrorSolution: The server may not be responding. Please check the server status.
